title: Marshill Sermon Archive
description:
I do not take any credit for this work. These sermons came from Marshill Church. 
I did my best to download all of these free sermons before they were all deleted from the internet. I cannot guarantee that every single sermon is here, but to my knowledge these are all of the older sermons that were taken off the web.
I have not edited any content. I hope Mark's sermons help you get to know Jesus. 

This is a b1 archive file. The files are not compressed so the quality will not suffer. Just download the free b1 archiver from b1.org to unzip the sermons. The download is a whopping 31.4 gb
Please Seed!!
